int current_step_number

Member Function Documentation

void WMG::AddFootstep ( const double  x_relative,
const double  y_relative,
const double  angle_relative,
const int  n_this,
const int  n,
const double *  d,
const fs_type  type = FS_TYPE_SS 
)

Adds a footstep to FS; sets the default constraints, the total number of iterations and the number of iterations in single support.

Parameters:
[in]x_relativex_relative X position [meter] relative to the previous footstep.
[in]y_relativey_relative Y position [meter] relative to the previous footstep.
[in]angle_relativeangle_relative Angle [rad.] relative to the previous footstep.
[in]n_thisNumber of (preview window) iterations in the added step.
[in]nTotal number of (preview window) iterations, i.e., nSS + nDS.
[in]dVector of the PoS constraints (assumed to be [4 x 1]).
[in]type(optional) type of the footstep.
Note:
Coordinates and angle are treated as absolute for the first step in the preview window.

Definition at line 143 of file WMG.cpp.

void WMG::AddFootstep ( const double  x_relative,
const double  y_relative,
const double  angle_relative,
const fs_type  type = FS_TYPE_SS 
)

Adds a footstep to FS.

Parameters:
[in]x_relativex_relative X position [meter] relative to the previous footstep.
[in]y_relativey_relative Y position [meter] relative to the previous footstep.
[in]angle_relativeangle_relative Angle [rad.] relative to the previous footstep.
[in]type(optional) type of the footstep.
Note:
Coordinates and angle are treated as absolute for the first step in the preview window.
Default vector of the PoS constraintsi, number of iterations in single support and total number of iterations are used.

Definition at line 204 of file WMG.cpp.

void WMG::AddFootstep ( const double  x_relative,
const double  y_relative,
const double  angle_relative,
const int  n_this,
const int  n,
const fs_type  type = FS_TYPE_SS 
)

Adds a footstep to FS; sets the default total number of iterations and the number of iterations in single support.

Parameters:
[in]x_relativex_relative X position [meter] relative to the previous footstep.
[in]y_relativey_relative Y position [meter] relative to the previous footstep.
[in]angle_relativeangle_relative Angle [rad.] relative to the previous footstep.
[in]n_thisNumber of (preview window) iterations in the added step.
[in]nTotal number of (preview window) iterations, i.e., nSS + nDS.
[in]type(optional) type of the footstep.
Note:
Coordinates and angle are treated as absolute for the first step in the preview window.
Default vector of the PoS constraints is used.

Returns:
WMG_OK or WMG_HALT (simulation must be stopped)

const double  _T,

)

Initializes a WMG object.

Parameters:
[in]_NNumber of sampling times in a preview window
[in]_TSampling time (for the moment it is assumed to be constant) [sec.]

NAO constraint with safety margin.

Definition at line 101 of file WMG.h.

int WMG::current_step_number [private]

This is the step in FS that is at the start of the current preview window. I don't need to pop_front steps from FS and that is why I use stl vector and not stl deque).
